name: Murphy & Bone Appetit
description:
Murphy is a Cavalier King Charles Spaniel who always wants attention. Below him is his Best Buddy, Bone Appetit. They have been friends ever since Murphy discovered that Bone Appetit had no taste. Be sure to pick them up along with some tasty treats!

**Check out my other shop for more items at www.morphs.etsy.com !

name: Wedding Cake Topper
description:
This Bride is 2 1/2 inches tall, curly hair (with rose in back), strapless dress, flower in hand, ring on finger, bare feet, veil in back, and a delicate expression on her face.
You may choose her hair, dress style and fabric, flower that she's holding and one in back, shoe style and color or bare feet, and anything else you wish to put in.

The Groom is 2 1/2 inches tall with a black tux, white shirt, black/brown shoes, red bow tie, brown hair, white rose in his front coat pocket, and a nervous smirk on his face. Same applies to the Groom- you can choose.

Choose from four poses: Side-By-Side, Dance dip, Kissing each other, and Dancing (Waltz).
EMAIL ME AT theclayqueen [!at] gmail.com for your requests on this!!!

(Buy this in 2 months advance)


cake not included


**Check out my other shop for more items at www.morphs.etsy.com !

name: Mary Ann & Cocoa
description:
Mary Ann is an African monkey who is always on the lookout for trouble with her Best Buddy coconut, Cocoa. Mary Ann and Cocoa always enjoy playing Hide-and-go-seek in the jungle and Pirates on the shore. If you’re always seeking adventure, be sure to bring Mary Ann & Cocoa along on your trip!

**Check out my other shop for more items at www.morphs.etsy.com !

name: Mini Mudd
description: Oink! Oink! Oink! Today we are visiting a very special place, Mudd’s farm. Mudd is the very first Mini Morph and he just loves to tag along with his other farm pals who also happen to be Mini Morphs and Morphs, just like him! ( By the way, his friends are on the way!) He loves rolling around in mudd puddles wih his playmate,___(Psst! Mudd’s pal is coming soon so be on the lookout!) Quick! Don’t just sit there! Buy him! Now! Get going! Off with you! GOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! **Check out my other shop for more items at www.morphs.etsy.com !

name: Maggie & Puff
description:
Maggie is a Polar Bear who always loves the snow! That's why her Best Buddy is a snowball, Puff. Because Maggie loves Puff so much, Maggie lives in an    igloo so Puff will never melt. Puff really appreciates it, so they have decided to be best buddies 4ever! If you love the snow as much as Maggie does, Maggie and Puff will be perfect for you!
